page.title: 04Nettlebed Estate
page.content: Nettlebed Estate owns the most land in the area.This consists of Dairy and Arable land it own 202 cattle and has about 60 calves a year.it owns 2,300 acres of land and has 6 workers.The dairy was built in 1968.All the cattle are frieseins.The dairy produces 3,685 litres of milk a year and holds 16 cows and owns 4 bulls.The estate has 9 tractors and 307 acres of grazing ground.This year they will plant 82 acres of winter barley.85 acres of oats 438 acres of winter wheat 119 acres of rape 7 acres for horses 10 acres for shooting.Nettlebed estate owns houses as well.43 houses and the village hall belongs to them.The estate has 2 game keepers and shooting starts october 1st till the 31st of january and is on saturday.The dryer has 2 big sylos to hold the corn and other crops.
